# Mnema
Mnema is a web app for spaced repetition flashcards. Users can create decks, import from Anki/CSV, and study with SRS.

## Key Pages
- https://mnema.app/
- https://mnema.app/public-decks
- https://mnema.app/create-deck
- https://mnema.app/privacy
- https://mnema.app/terms

## Notes
- Import supports APKG/CSV/TSV/TXT, preview and field mapping.
- Media attachments include images, audio, and video.
